edu.mccc.cos210.cmwar
Interface Connection

public interface Connection

Connection interface for Circuit Maker with AutoRouter A Connection is what can connect two Connectables / Components

Version:
0.1
Author:
Rohit Kumar

Method Summary
 ConnectionPoint[] getEnds()
          Method to get the components connected by this connection

          Method to set the ends of a connection.
 

Method Detail

getEnds

ConnectionPoint[] getEnds()
Method to get the components connected by this connection

Returns:
An array of size 2 with the Components

setEnds

void setEnds(ConnectionPoint a,
             ConnectionPoint b)
Method to set the ends of a connection.

Parameters:
a - A Component to be connected.
b - Opposite Component to be connected to A, and vice versa.
